hero.trustLine: Since 2006 • Factory in Resende-RJ • Presence in 15+ countries
wire.label: WHO IS EQUIPILATES?
wire.title: Reference in high-performance Pilates Equipment. We elevate the technical standard of your studio.
wire.classicText: Absolute fidelity to Joseph Pilates' original method. Our classic line uses exact measurements and calibrated springs to guarantee pure biomechanics, ideal for studios that prioritize tradition and technical results.
wire.contempText: Innovation and versatility for today's fitness market. Our contemporary line offers quick adjustments and advanced ergonomics, being perfect for dynamic studios looking for high student flow and maximum durability.
features.title: Pilates Equipment: Where Biomechanics meets Longevity
features.subtitle: More than just equipment, an industrial structure dedicated to your studio's success.
features.item1.title: Industrial Strength
features.item1.text: Own industrial park of 2,500m² with total quality control at each stage.
features.item2.title: Physiotherapist DNA
features.item2.text: Equipment designed by specialists in biomechanics and human body health.
features.item3.title: Export Standard
features.item3.text: Quality validated in the world's most demanding markets, such as USA, Europe and Asia.
features.item4.title: Noble Materials
features.item4.text: Stainless Steel and Solid Wood structures that guarantee extreme longevity to the investment.
features.item5.title: Real Warranty
features.item5.text: Total safety with 2 years warranty and specialized technical assistance direct from the factory.
features.item6.title: Immediate Replacement
features.item6.text: Large stock of parts and accessories to ensure your studio never has to stop.
gallery.title: Excellence in Every Detail
gallery.subtitle: Explore the technical precision and superior design that define the Equipilates brand.
classica.label: PILATES EQUIPMENT
classica.title: Classic Line:
classica.subtitle: Pilates equipment developed with Joseph Pilates' exact measurements. Pure biomechanics, noble materials, and millimetric precision for studios that value tradition.
cta.banner.text:
Opening your first studio or expanding?
Speak with an expert now!
origin.label: THE FOUNDER'S DNA
origin.title: Equipment Designed by Those Who Understand the Human Body
origin.text1: Founded in 2006 by physiotherapist Rafael Iazpeck, Equipilates was born from a real need: Pilates equipment that truly respected biomechanics and Joseph Pilates' original method.
origin.text2: Unlike other brands, our equipment is not just designed by engineers. They are developed by those who understand the human body, movement and rehabilitation. This is the difference that makes Equipilates the choice of professionals who value technical precision and profound results.
origin.highlight: Equipment designed by a physiotherapist, manufactured with technical rigor and total respect for Joseph Pilates' legacy.
contact.title: Ready to plan your studio's next step?
contact.body: Speak with a consultant and receive guidance to choose the ideal line, kit and layout for your space.
